com.soa.delegate

Interface HandlerProvider


  • public interface HandlerProvider
    Interface of the SOA Software delegate for handling/processing messages.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SourceMessage handle(HandlerContext context, SourceMessage in)
      Delivers a message to a service provider after implementing all required policies.

    • Method Detail

      • handle

        SourceMessage handle(HandlerContext context,
                     SourceMessage in)
              throws DelegateException
        Delivers a message to a service provider after implementing all required policies.
        Parameters:
        context - Context of the message to be delivered.
        in - SourceMessage being delivered.
        Returns:
        Response message (if any).
        Throws:
        DelegateException - Thrown if the delegate could not perform the delivery.
